docs.title: Conventions
docs.text:
Document Version: v1.2.2_23-05-30

Interface Protocol: http/https

Message format: json

Message Encoding: utf-8

Spot API Address: https://oapi.websea.com/

Futures API Address: https://coapi.websea.com/

Spot Websocket API Address: wss://oapi.websea.com/

Futures Websocket API Address: wss://coapi.websea.com/

docs.title: Authentication and Authorization
docs.text: Regarding token and secret-key application and modification, please carry out the relevant operations on the "Personal Center - Open API" page.

docs.title: Interface Permission Verification
docs.text:
Client requests the transaction interface, the headers must include the Nonce, token, Signature parameters. For example:

Python
$header[] = 'Nonce: 1534927978_ab43c';
$header[] = 'Token: 57ba172a6be125cca2f449826f9980ca';
$header[] = 'Signature: v490hupi0s0bckcp6ivb69p921';
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $header);

docs.title: token：
docs.text: User Token, please check in "Personal Center - Open API".

docs.title: Nonce：
docs.text: Random Number, the client generates a random character with each request. Generation rule, timestamp_5 alphanumeric characters. For example: 1534927978_ab43c Note: The time deviation must not exceed 60 seconds, and the same random number can only be used once.

docs.title: Signature：
docs.text: Signature, calculated using $token, $secret_key, $nonce, $_POST, $_GET, verified by the server to ensure the request originates from the user.

docs.title: Python Sample Code for Generating Signature:
docs.text:
Python
def sign(Nonce,data=dict()):

    tmp = list()
    tmp.append(TOKEN)
    tmp.append(SECRET)
    tmp.append(Nonce)
    for d,x in data.items():
        tmp.append(str(d) + "=" + str(x))

    return hashlib.sha1(''.join(sorted(tmp))).hexdigest()

docs.title: Rate Limiting Rules
docs.text:
Interface Name Interface URL Rate Limit Query 24-hour Market Data /openApi/market/detail 100 requests/10s Query Trading Pair Precision /openApi/market/precision 100 requests/10s Query 24-hour Market List /openApi/market/24kline 100 requests/10s Query Kline /openApi/market/kline 100 requests/10s Query Market Depth /openApi/market/depth 100 times/10s Query Market Merged Depth /openApi/market/gears_depth 100 times/10s Query Market Trades /openApi/market/trade 100 times/10s Query Supported Trading Pairs /openApi/market/symbols 100 requests/10s My Assets /openApi/wallet/list 100 times/10s My Trading Fee Rate /openApi/entrust/rate 100 times/10s Commission Order /openApi/entrust/add 100 times/10s Cancel Order /openApi/entrust/cancel 100 requests/10s My Current Orders /openApi/entrust/currentList 100 requests/10s My Historical Orders /openApi/entrust/historyList 100 requests/10s Entrust Transaction Details /openApi/entrust/detail 100 times/10s

Note: The above is the maximum visit frequency for each interface. Global limit for open APIs: 100 times per 10 seconds (limited by individual APIKEY, it is recommended to add signatures to market data API access; otherwise, the frequency restrictions will be stricter). Please use the access quota reasonably.

Python 2.X
#!/usr/bin/env python2
#encoding=utf8

import sys
reload(sys)
sys.setdefaultencoding('utf-8')
import json
import time
import hashlib
import requests
import random
import string


TOKEN = "5c9dc98fb92e2"
SECRET = "hkyavn13ybc1qunp4rpb"
HOST = "http://api.xxx.com"


'''
request Usage Instructions

args = dict()
args['url']    = 'http://blog.csdn.net/iloveyin/article/details/21444613'
args['method'] = 'GET'
args['cookies'] = {}
args['data']   = {}
args['header'] = {"user-agent":"Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 6.0; Windows NT 5.1; SV1; .NET CLR 1.1.4322)"}
args['proxy'] = '10.0.0.5'
args['timeout'] = 30
args['encoding'] = 'gbk'

result = request(args)

result['code']
result['content']

'''

#HTTP Request Methods
def request(args):

    if not (args.has_key('timeout')):
        args['timeout'] = 60

#Proxy Settings(proxy)
    if not (args.has_key('proxy')):
        proxies = None
    else:
        if not args.has_key('proxy') == '':
            if not args.has_key('proxy_type'):
                args['proxy_type'] = 'http'
            if args['proxy_type'] == 'http':
                proxies = {"http":"http://"+args['proxy'],"https":"http://"+args['proxy']}
            elif args['proxy_type'] == 'socks':
                proxies = {"http":"socks5://"+args['proxy'],"https":"socks5://"+args['proxy']}
        else:
            proxies = None

    if not (args.has_key('method')):
        args['method'] = 'GET'
    else:
        args['method'] = args['method'].upper()

#Header Settings
    if not (args.has_key('headers')):
        args['headers'] = {}

    if not args['headers'].has_key('user-agent'):
        args['headers']['user-agent'] = "Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_10_5) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/58.0.3029.110 Safari/537.36"


    #Cookies
    cookies = {}
    if args.has_key('cookies'):
        cookies = args['cookies']

    if not args.has_key('data'):
        args['data'] = {}

    args['headers'].update(mkHeader(args['data']))

    if args['method'] == 'GET':
        r = requests.get(args['url'], params=args['data'],cookies=cookies,headers=args['headers'],timeout=int(args['timeout']), proxies=proxies, verify=False)
    elif args['method'] == 'POST':
        r = requests.post(args['url'], data=args['data'],cookies=cookies,headers=args['headers'],timeout=int(args['timeout']), proxies=proxies, verify=False)

    result = {}
    result['code'] = r.status_code
    ck = {}
    for cookie in r.cookies:
        ck.update({cookie.name : cookie.value})
    result['cookies'] = ck
    result['headers'] = r.headers
    result['content'] = r.content

    return result



# Generating http signed headers
def mkHeader(data=dict()):
    ran_str = ''.join(random.sample(string.ascii_letters + string.digits, 5))
    Nonce = "%d_%s" % (int(time.time()),ran_str)
    header=dict()
    header['Token'] = TOKEN
    header['Nonce'] = Nonce
    header['Signature'] = sign(Nonce,data)

    return header

#Signature Generation Method
def sign(Nonce,data=dict()):

    tmp = list()
    tmp.append(TOKEN)
    tmp.append(SECRET)
    tmp.append(Nonce)
    for d,x in data.items():
        tmp.append(str(d) + "=" + str(x))

    return hashlib.sha1(''.join(sorted(tmp))).hexdigest()



if __name__ == '__main__':

#Obtain K-line
    args = dict()
    args['url']     = HOST +  '/openApi/market/kline'
    args['method']  = 'GET'
    args['data']    = dict()
    args['data']['symbol']  = "BTC-USDT"
    args['data']['period']  = "1min"
    args['data']['size']    = 2000

    result = request(args)

    if result['code']==200:
        print result['content']
    else:
        print result

    print '-'*100

# Query My Assets
    args = dict()
    args['url'] =  HOST + '/openApi/wallet/list'
    args['method'] = 'GET'
    args['data'] = dict()
    args['data']['currency'] = "BTC"

    result = request(args)

    if result['code']==200:
        print result['content']
    else:
        print result

    print '-'*100

#Delegate Order Submission
    args = dict()
    args['url'] = HOST + '/openApi/entrust/add'
    args['method'] = 'POST'
    args['data'] = dict()
    args['data']['symbol'] = "BTC-USDT"
    args['data']['type'] = "buy-limit"
    args['data']['amount'] = 1.343432
    args['data']['price'] = 500.323214

    result = request(args)

    if result['code']==200:
        print result['content']
    else:
        print result

docs.text:
Python
#!/usr/bin/env python
#encoding=utf8

import sys
import json
import time
import hashlib
import requests
import random
import string


TOKEN = "5c9dc98fb92e2"
SECRET = "hkyavn13ybc1qunp4rpb"
HOST = "http://api.xxx.com"


'''
request Usage Instructions

args = dict()
args['url']    = 'http://blog.csdn.net/iloveyin/article/details/21444613'
args['method'] = 'GET'
args['cookies'] = {}
args['data']   = {}
args['header'] = {"user-agent":"Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 6.0; Windows NT 5.1; SV1; .NET CLR 1.1.4322)"}
args['proxy'] = '10.0.0.5'
args['timeout'] = 30
args['encoding'] = 'gbk'

result = request(args)

result['code']
result['content']

'''

#HTTP Request Methods
def request(args):

    if not 'timeout' in args:
        args['timeout'] = 60


    if not 'method' in args:
        args['method'] = 'GET'
    else:
        args['method'] = args['method'].upper()

#Header Configuration
    if not 'headers' in args:
        args['headers'] = {}

    if not 'user-agent' in args['headers']:
        args['headers']['user-agent'] = "Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_10_5) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/58.0.3029.110 Safari/537.36"


    #Cookies
    cookies = {}
    if 'cookies' in args:
        cookies = args['cookies']

    if not 'data' in args:
        args['data'] = {}

    args['headers'].update(mkHeader(args['data']))

    if args['method'] == 'GET':
        r = requests.get(args['url'], params=args['data'],cookies=cookies,headers=args['headers'],timeout=int(args['timeout']),  verify=False)
    elif args['method'] == 'POST':
        r = requests.post(args['url'], data=args['data'],cookies=cookies,headers=args['headers'],timeout=int(args['timeout']), verify=False)

    result = {}
    result['code'] = r.status_code
    ck = {}
    for cookie in r.cookies:
        ck.update({cookie.name : cookie.value})
    result['cookies'] = ck
    result['headers'] = r.headers
    result['content'] = r.content

    return result



# Method of Generating HTTP Headers with Signature
def mkHeader(data=dict()):
    ran_str = ''.join(random.sample(string.ascii_letters + string.digits, 5))
    Nonce = "%d_%s" % (int(time.time()),ran_str)
    header=dict()
    header['Token'] = TOKEN
    header['Nonce'] = Nonce
    header['Signature'] = sign(Nonce,data)

    return header

#Signature Generation Method
def sign(Nonce,data=dict()):

    tmp = list()
    tmp.append(TOKEN)
    tmp.append(SECRET)
    tmp.append(Nonce)
    for d,x in data.items():
        tmp.append(str(d) + "=" + str(x))

    return hashlib.sha1(''.join(sorted(tmp)).encode("utf8")).hexdigest()




if __name__ == '__main__':

#Get K-line data
    args = dict()
    args['url']     = HOST + '/openApi/market/kline'
    args['method']  = 'GET'
    args['data']    = dict()
    args['data']['symbol']  = "BTC-USDT"
    args['data']['period']  = "1min"
    args['data']['size']    = 2000

    result = request(args)

    if result['code']==200:
        print(result['content'])
    else:
        print(result)

    print('-'*100)

#Query My Assets
    args = dict()
    args['url'] = HOST +  '/openApi/wallet/list'
    args['method'] = 'GET'
    args['data'] = dict()
    args['data']['currency'] = "BTC"

    result = request(args)

    if result['code']==200:
        print(result['content'])
    else:
        print(result)

    print('-'*100)

#Delegate Listing
    args = dict()
    args['url'] = HOST +  '/openApi/entrust/add'
    args['method'] = 'POST'
    args['data'] = dict()
    args['data']['symbol'] = "BTC-USDT"
    args['data']['type'] = "buy-limit"
    args['data']['amount'] = 1.343432
    args['data']['price'] = 500.323214

    result = request(args)

    if result['code']==200:
        print(result['content'].decode("utf8"))
    else:
        print(result)

docs.text: Parameter Name Required Type Example Description symbol 否 string BTC-USDT Trading pair, pass the parameter separated by ",", to query multiple trading pair 24-hour market data, e.g., BTC-USDT,ETH-USDT. If no parameter is passed, details of all trading pairs are obtained

docs.title: WS / K-line Channel
docs.text: Address/future-ws/v1/market

docs.title: Description
docs.text: Retrieve K-line Data, the push frequency is as fast as once per second, data is not pushed when no event is triggered, the events that trigger a push are: Transactions.

docs.title: Channel Name
docs.text:
kline${period}

Note: In channel names, "period" refers to the timeframe. For example: for 1 minute candlestick data: kline1min. The currently supported timeframes include:

Time-sharing Value 1 minute 1min 5 minutes 5min 15 minutes 15min 30 minutes 30min 1 hour 1hour 6小时 6hour 12小时 12 hours 1 Day 1day 1 week 1week January 1mon
